plot: Shelter by the Sea is a homeless man's testament to his own destitution and despair. It is a cry for help, a mewl of defeat, and an indictment of society's indifference.
title: Shelter by the Sea
plot_es: Shelter by the Sea is a homeless man's testament to his own destitution and despair. It is a cry for help, a mewl of defeat, and an indictment of society's indifference.
plot_en: Shelter by the Sea is a homeless man's testament to his own destitution and despair. It is a cry for help, a mewl of defeat, and an indictment of society's indifference.
